Have I to modify cantera c=
onfigure script? and how in this case?
Or simply have I to create a matlab =
script link where cantera can find it? 
Where? (I have tried in /usr/local/=
bin, but it doesn't work...)

message:

hey say that gcc,g++,g77 are 
needed. I haven't found g++ package too.
I'm =

Christian




>  Hi=
 Christian,
>
>  The instalation directory is unlikely the reason of the er=
ror. It looks
>  like you have the error when installing. Is cantera succes=
sfully built?
>  Check the=A0=A0 message again when you type 'make'.
>
>  M=
ake sure there is matlab script links in /usr/local/bin or whereever
>  can=
tera can find. Also, you probably need sundials to build cantera.
>
>  Good=
 Luck
>
>  Li-Chun Chien (Ricky)
>  Combustion Modelling Lab
>  University =
of California, Berkeley
